_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The nature of impermanence [sn35.1:2.21]: What’s not-self should be truly seen with right understanding like this: ‘This is not mine, I am not this, this is not my self.’
The process of liberation (a causal chai: Seeing this, a learned noble disciple grows disillusioned with the six sense bases
When desire fades away they’re freed
When they’re freed, they know they’re freed
They understand: ‘Rebirth is ended, the spiritual journey has been completed, what had to be done has been done, there is no return to any state of existence.’”
